content.detailedDescription: Was sitting on the front porch and at 9:44 pm one ufo like object appeared from the east and was hovering for a few minutes and my husband and i both go what is that, and i jumped up and ran into the living room to get the camera and the first object took off north and then two more objects appeared from the east and hovered, they had orange colored lights going all the way around, there was no sound what so ever, then they took off north, there was no trailing of lights, they were just gone.  we both could not believe what we had seen, or what they were. we were like were those ufo's. excited to be able to get pictures, although they aren't that good of photos, but at least i have some, just wish i could have gotten better pictures.
content.summary: 3 ufo like objects

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i flew out of san francisco 7/6/14 on us airways flight 633 around 3:45 pm.  shortly after takeoff, i started taking pictures from the window facing the bay which is on the right side of the aircraft (looking from rear to front).  the reason i took pictures was because there was a lot of sun glare and i thought i could take pictures and see the landscape later from the photos.  
i pressed the phone to the windows while i took about 15 shots one after the other without much pause between shots.
a couple of days later as i was reviewing and editing my photos i noticed what may be a ufo.  the attached picture is the only one that shows what appears to be (to me) a ufo.  i say this to eliminate the possibility that there was something on the window which would have been in other shots.  also, i was sitting in the very last seat at the rear of the plane.   
so, i never saw this with the naked eye.  captured by cell phone camera only.
content.summary: See attached photo

content.detailedDescription: I was standing outside my house, south san bernardino, california, approximately 10:45 pm enjoying the warm evening, facing a south direction, looking towards the moon, out of the corner of my eye, i see a yellowish, orange glow heading from the south- southwest horizon, very much out of the ordinary. it was traveling towards the northeast, i'm my direction. i continued to observe, and as it got closer overhead, i truly though it was an aircraft on fire, as you can see the presence of flames on it. very scary. the fireball continued for another two minutes or so in a northeast direction, and i observed that it was drastically slowing down just about over my head but slightly to the east.It appeared as if it were going to change directions, completely stopped for about five seconds, just burning. then it began to flicker, like a type of strobe, it flickered twice, then completely disappeared.I went online to see if an aircraft had disappeared or crashed, nothing reported, and i'm thinking i may have been the only one to see this object. in australia, a few days ago, there was a report of space junk from a recent space launch. i don't know if its possible for this to be space junk from the launch, but it was very frightening and has me baffled to this very moment. i observe the night sky as often as possible, seen many other objects which have been unexplainable, but this was absolutely frightening. i sure wish i had photo or video proof.
content.summary: High speed flaing object, going fast, then slowing down dramatically above head, then flickers twice, disappears

content.detailedDescription: i was working in my back yard when i noticed an object above the trees, at least 100ft.Above the ground, coming from the s.W.It was grey in color,no sound, went overhead, with no change in orietation of the orbs. not very     fast i watched until going behind trees in the n.W. sky.It looked like a dumb-bell,two titanium grey balls connected by cylinder at their equators.The balls kept level in flight as it changed direction smoothly, from s.W.To the n.W. horizon. i lost sight as it went behind neighbors trees.At first i thought the object was a balloon of some kind,but the way it was moving was not like something being moved by the wind, it kept a level flight and did not twist or roll or change elevation.Its motion was smooth and constant.I watched it until it went behind the trees in my neighbors yard. i knew at the time that i was watching something unusual,but i did not contact you until now because i did not think anyone would believe me. but after watching mufon investigations on t.V.,i decided to contact you. i am a master gasfitter/plumber and was in buisness on my own for over10years,and have been a responsible member of our town.I hope maybe someone else saw this same object.I think this object was some sort a probe because of its size.I told my wife and daughter and my brother about this object the day i saw it.I want to know what this thing was!
content.summary: Two orbs connected by cylinder at orbs equator, like a dumb-bell, level flight above trees,from sw tonw

content.detailedDescription:
At 3 am on the june 4th, 2014 i was in bed next to my wife reading on my kindle, i was under covers. an orb enter room thru window, and move to the foot of my bed. my feet felt stiff and painful for a little bit, then orb left thru same window. i stay stunted for a few minutes afterward and when i regain my senses back was at 330 am. my wife was still sleep and didn't witness the event. this is not the first time that i have seen and reported orbs at this location. also i have witness other ufo's in the area. 
thank you for your time
1
content.summary: Orb appear at the foot of my bed, i felt my feet go stiff and then hurt a bit, orb stay for a few minutes and then left. i was in my kindle when orb enter room thur window and left the same way.

content.detailedDescription: Around 11:30am on july the 12th myself and my wife were driving on 77n (around grant ave.) headed towards downtown cleveland when i glanced towards the sky and saw a thick disc like object flying nw to w. it was a white/grey color with the right last quarter of it being bright red. there didn't appear to be any lights emitting from it. i turned to my wife and asked what the object looked like to her. she said possibly a blimp. in my opinion it was way too flat and moving to fast to be a blimp. the object could have been flying over newburg heights, tremont, or ohio city. it looked very large from the distance i saw it from which was at least 1 mile away. i saw it for a solid 10 seconds before trees on the southbound side of 77 blocked my view.
content.summary: Thick disc flying nw to w

content.detailedDescription:
On my porch smoking at 10:40 pm july 12, in san marcos.  noticed 2 bright lights to north, low to horizon. side by side, yellow above horizon.  first side by side, then one above the other.  stayed for about one minute.  the lower suddenly ended, with a slight faint residue of light just before completely black.  after 18 or so seconds, another light appeared to east of remaining light.  after 2 minutes or so, one light disappeared.  i filmed the last light a few minutes, then it too was gone, and nothing else happened.  
i watch the sky daily, i noticed the lights because i had never seen that before on the night sky.
i had no idea what it might be and still do not.
i lost sight because the sky was dark.  it was about 11pm when i then checked the time.  i was excited because i finally got to witness what might be ufo activity.  last month a friend described a similar event.  when i googled it, i found something on the news.  this sounds like a similar description of what i witnessed.
content.summary: First 2 lights which aligned. one dissolved.  then above one , another appeared.  one dissolved.  then all were gone

content.detailedDescription: My family and i just left the evergreen speedway for my 23rd birthday get together, because my birthday is on a monday family found a cool weekend surprise for me, after the races on july 12, 2014 going north on us-2 at 10:40 my girlfriend, mother, her boyfriend, and i notice these two fireballs swizzeling downward around lake stevens leaving fiery trail behind coming to a stop above tree lines some where, we were about 5 miles away, then making abrupt changes at increasing and decreasing speed and staying within a small area, then combining with each other and the fire would cease and it would b a glowing solid sphere for about 30 seconds, to break apart in flames leaving flaming sparking trails, then one disappeared and then instantly reappeared continuing to stay close to the other object this continued for roughly 20 minuets before some tree lines effected our view for a couple min and then we  were able to see the area we thought they were they were gone and a aircraft with flight lights on was flying in the area and made a sudden ascend in altitude one before heading south, about five minuets before we lost site of them fireworks were going off more south east of the fireballs. to insane to identify, to confused to know what it was at most i could think of is two big model airplane with twenty minuet flares or something, only other option is the unknown.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Two fire ball object making insane directional aerial changes, then combining as a solid object stationary, then splitting into two fire balls again moving

content.detailedDescription: Appeared as a translucent orb, shiny red.  what was peculiar is that inside the sphere it appeared to be a fire burning.  that's what attracted my attention and i immediately began rational analysis of what i was seeing.  the visual information made no sense.  the best way to describe what my mind identified it as would be "a floating translucent orb balloon with fire inside taking up about 3/4 of interior space, filling bottom but not filling top 1/3".  it traveled slowly from east to west, but at a perfectly horizontal level.  then appeared to go directly north (away from me) more rapidly, disappearing from view within about 15 seconds by seeming to get smaller and smaller.  unable to guess distance, passed behind a tree which is about 20' away.  there is a tower with light some miles at a distance that flashes a red light constantly and makes a good comparison, and that light is much smaller than the orb.  took place at night, so could not tell if it passed in front of tower, but was at elevation different from tower light.  full moon was at about 4 o'clock relative to me, object moved from about 2 o'clock to about 11 before appearing to move directly away (which i infer because object seemed to shrink to pinpoint and disappear).
content.summary: Translucent red orb with fire burning inside

content.detailedDescription: Iwas looking for arrowheads in pasture late in the evening. the sun went down and we were driving out of the pasture with headlights on. we were talking about the supermoon and wondering where it was. the moon started coming ta that time and we were talking about how big it was. right when the moon was about to leave the horizon an object came from the point where the moon was touching the ridgeline towards us at a small angle up at very high rate of speed. i jumped out of the pickup,turned it off, and watched it go by. it was big ,lighted,pretty and fast without no sound. all i can say is if we built this thing we are ready to explore other worlds. what a show !!!!!!
content.summary: On ranch driving home and was looking at super moon, object come from area where moon was rising. stoped and started say ing ufo ufo ufo to friend got out of pickup and object took off at high rate of speed. friend it was butiful.

content.detailedDescription: June 12 2014 my wife, my daughter, and i and three of my inlaws were outside when my brother inlaw look up at the night sky and told us all to look up were we all witness something the looked like a falling star or a glowing sphere it started to go upward than it split in two seperated objects then disappeared.
content.summary: Look like a falling star than it curved starting goinng upward split in two and then disappeared

content.detailedDescription: Around 10.30 pm.On the 12/07/2014 i went into my back garden with a torch to look for our resident hedgehog. i saw something out of the corner of my eye, looked up and saw a luminescent green orb-like object. i have never witnessed anything like it, i would describe myself as a sceptical person and a realist.I did not know what it was but i knew it wasn't an aeroplane as it was too close and was silent. it was at treetop height and hovered for a few  seconds. i kept watching and it moved behind, then above the trees and shone a beam of bright green light over the surrounding houses. it was first seen at sse and ended up at sw. it then just disappeared.
content.summary: In back garden looking for hedgehog with torch. saw something out of corner of eye, looked up and saw bright green orb.

content.detailedDescription:
My boyfriend and i were at the woodlands pavillion right at the back on the lawn watching lionel richie when we noticed a light coming from the left of the stage. at first i thought it was a plane but it was moving far too quickly. as it streaked past us still to our left, within a few seconds, we could see it was a weird blue-green colour. suddenly it split into two before disintegrating into nothing.
neither my boyfriend nor i knew what we'd seen, but as we looked at other people in the crowd standing by us to see if they'd also observed what we had, they all confirmed they'd seen the same thing and had no idea what it was. it definitely wasn't a plane's lights that's for sure.
even more interesting was that about an hour before that, i pointed out a sole black helicopter flying over to our right in the direction of the stage. it wasn't a hospital helicopter and looked more like an army one only this was black. as far as i'm aware there aren't any army bases that close to houston so i wasn't sure why a helicopter like this would be flying so low and close to where we were. when we saw the weird lights it just made me even more curious.
content.summary: Fast moving green-blue orb that split into two and disintegrated in the sky

content.detailedDescription: We were on our boat on chautauqua lake when 4 of us seen a very large stationary lighted object.We observed this for several minutes watching this object at times brighten and dim. the object then made a very quick movement and hovered again and then another object came out of it.The other object was the same reddish orange color.Both objects then just disappeared.
content.summary: Lighted object over chautauqua lake n.Y at 10 pm july 11 2014

content.detailedDescription: We were on our deck, out to view the super moon. as my husband and i walked back around our wrap around deck, i saw an extremely bright light coming from the east. we sit on our deck frequently and view the night sky. lived in the same house 35 years. we live west of austin, texas and are in the flight plan for planes flying east to west out of austin. the light was moving fast toward us. i commented to my husband, "if that is a helicopter, it is moving faster than i have ever seen."  the light was moving low and suddenly we could see a second light behind, just as bright. the structure came across in front of us and we both could see a long cylinder, silver shaped with bright, white lights on both ends. there were no windows.  my husband said, "that is close to us and there is no sound". he had on binos and he lifted them up to look closer.  the structure suddenly  turned up at an angle, north west at this time, and just disappeared. the structure was as long as boeing jet, but with a long cylinder body. we have seen in past years, the space shuttle, the iss cross the sky in our area and viewed many comets. this structure moved faster than anything we have ever seen. this was shocking and a little unsettling.
content.summary: Viewed a huge cylinder with bright lights on both ends. structure had silver body, no windows.

content.detailedDescription: At around 10.30-10.50 i spotted two flame like balls of light, one above the other. they hovered for a while like lanterns and they then went in different directions, one traveled to the left and i lost sight of it, the other hovered at a fair speed to the right and then changed direction fairly abruptly. it then hovered for a little more time.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Two lights, one above the other hovered then went in separate directions. one light changed direction

content.detailedDescription: Me and my friend we both were sitting on the terrace of my building and talking.At that time i was sitting on the north west direction and there are clouds in the sky and i am watching it after sometime i spotted a yellow light in the sky first i thought that that it might be an airplane or helicopter but it was flying stationery at one place only then i said my friend to see it then he was also watching it.And after some more time it's light turned off and it was looking full black in color.And we were just watching it only and after few min. we couldn't see it and it goes invisible. and we had lost it.
content.summary: When i saw the ufo ,i was sitting on the building terrace of my society. and we both had seen it  and we were shoked.

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i walked outside of our house to try and watch the super moon.
we saw 2 very bright lights zipping through the sky.
they were dancing around each other
after 2 seconds they were already almost on the other side of the sky , they separated and disappeared, either in the distance or they somehow turned off their light.
the object appeared to be not too far in the distance.
content.summary: Two balls of light dancing in the sky zipping very fast then separating

content.detailedDescription: Was at mililani wal-mart parking lot. saw the sky had unusual design.Got my cell samsung s5. took couple shots. seem unusual for the moon to be at that spot.Viewed pics to find this.Submitting.
content.summary: Just sky shot.

content.detailedDescription:
This is not really an ufo sighting report. 

from the age of 14, i have seen strange things in the sky. the first very surreal experience was when i was 14 in goa with my brother. i saw a light make sudden movements in the sky, when i asked my brother to confirm if it's a plane, it made one more quick movement and disappeared. this scared the life out of my brother and i. since that time, i remember waking up one morning in what felt like my room. i was paralysed and everything was white and bright. i felt as if something was holding me down and that scared me a lot. i tried to say 'our father' in my head and it felt extremely difficult to process any words in my head. eventually, everything the room was clear and was no longer paralysed. throughout being under paralysis, i had been trying to screen and think i even managed to scream a couple of times. i ran out of the room and asked my family why they had not come in to help and why they did not hear my screams. turned out, no one heard anything and i probably just had a nightmare - a very very real one. my mother sprinkled some holy water on me and told me it was going to be fine...

in london, my bed was next to a window. i had had a couple of 'paralysis' moments then but none of them seemed to scare me. i saw glowing objects in the distance at night from my room and felt like i had to look at the sky on most nights. for a few years after i moved from there, it was all fine. no sighting, no paralysis. 

in 2010, after i got married, it started happening again. i started seeing more 'lights' in the sky and dreams of natural disasters. 

last year i had a dream that has stuck in my head - well, parts of it anyway. i was in an operating room and these two beings were extracting what looked like fat out of my body and injecting it into theirs. i was very comfortable with it all and even went on to say to one of those beings that "it's okay. i think you need the fat." soon after, i was shown this room  full of people from different backgrounds wearing white clothing. i was told this was the new world and everyone here is happy. within seconds, i was getting on the london underground with my friends and woke up. 

over the last few weeks, i have been having recurring dreams of looking up at the night sky. sometimes alone and sometimes with friends or family. the theme is the same. i am looking up and there are crafts of different shapes and sizes. recently, i also noticed a triangle formed on my left arm that feels like it means something. there is a birthmark on my right hand which also feels like it means somethings - it looks like a number '4'. i have also been waking up with scars that disappear over time. the most disturbing one was on my navel that looks like a burn/rash and disappeared soon after. now i have what looks like snake bit marks on my right arm. 

i know how crazy all this sounds and maybe my mind is just making everything up to cover some deep sub concious issue i may have? i do not know. 

i almost forgot to mention, i have gained a deep interest in astronomy and astrology in the last few years, just 'know' certain things before they happen and can hear high pitch noises if i try to meditate. currently, i think i can guess what people are thinking and i am right on most occasions. i am working on developing this further. 

i have attached a picture of the most recent marks i found. this could also just an insect bite - i am not sure.
content.summary: I have witnessed ufo's on numerous occasions. the recent one was grey/shiny metallic and i saw it whilst driving with my husband. he did not see it.

content.detailedDescription: Witness (a) took his dog out at a little after midnight when he observed a basketball sized fireball at tree-top level about 100��� altitude to the south.  he observed orange and yellow colors in the fireball as it gradually gained altitude as it headed to the sw.
content.summary: Ob served a basketball sized, orange/yellow, fireball.

content.detailedDescription: It was around 7:30 am was at my daughter's house on deck to smoke a cigg. i always like to take pics of the sky. i did take couple pics. but didn't see object until i looked over my pics. couldn't see it with my eyes. made spot larger and that's the pic i'm submitting.  pic was taken with my samsung s5. also took couple pics of same area maybe a min or two. size of object changed.
content.summary: Not sure if it is one.

content.detailedDescription: Exactly one year ago we saw the same phenomena....On july 11, 2013 we saw a sphir orange traveling at great speeds from south to east and disappearing in the sky....Last night we saw the same thing but 5 sphir bright orange traveling from south and turning to east....We were both outside in our backyard when we observed the phenomena.....We knew the object was the same type we saw a year ago....No doubt...Every sphir appeared one at a time one after each other (not all together)....We both asked each other what we were seeing and no doubt we were seeing the same thing.....Bright orange ball in the sky traveling at immense speed for the size and distance.....Very amazing.
content.summary: 5 orange bright sphir appeared to us...Coming from the south and turning to the east ....On the same flight path...But not appearing at the same time...One after the other........

content.detailedDescription:
it was ��evening 1980 xmas day when i was 14 1/2. ��i was with ��my dad and step mum driving to my aunts house in eldene swindon. we parked outside her house and were about to get out when we saw this large dark grey dull metal coloured zeppelin shaped ufo just above the houses in front of us. it was the length of 2 houses and seemed to be just above them still and silent. the bottom half had ridges going all around and it had lights all along the top half.��

my dad went to get out of the car to show my aunty, me and my step mum were too scared to get out of the car. i can remember grabbing my dads jacket shoulder and yelling at him not to get out,my step mum was really panicing and near hysterical. i remember leaning in between the 2 front ��seats and just staring up at it,it felt like it was looming over us. after what seemed like ages but was probably only a minute it divided up into about 5 ��sections and shot off one after the other to the left at lightening speed. i have read reports that there was a meteor that night as well as a russian space ship breaking up. this was definitely none of them it was close enough to us and clear enough that i could see the ridges on the bottom half.
we were shocked by it and still talk about it.
content.summary: Saw infront of us above the houses a dark grey zepellin shaped ship.

content.detailedDescription: M wife and i saw the ufo discribed coming towards us as we looked for sea shells on the beach ,,,,,it got brighter as it approached us then it seem to stop or discend straigh up thru the clouds and disappear without a trace of a single running light , , ,,blew me and my wife away ,,,,,,,
content.summary: It was an bright (orange-red glowing ) candlestick like beam of bright ligjt

content.detailedDescription:
My husband and i were driving home from seeing our newborn son in the hospital. our apartment building was at the end of a road on a cliff. there were 2 roads that led directly to it as it was at the end of both roads. before we ever got close, from the freeway we noticed a bright light that seemed to be above the area where i apartment building was. as we got to the road that would take us to the apartment we saw it. it was huge, round, silent, with small lights that went around the middle section of the craft. it also had a dome on the top. as we drew closer it began moving in our direction, it was right above the tree tops and the trees were just slightly taller than our 3 story apartment. my husband at the time said that he was going to follow it and i said, "not with me in the truck!" i remember getting out of the truck close to the entrance of the apartment door. as i was walking towards the door i turned back to see my husband pulling away to follow the craft. i never remember going into the apartment or discussing the event even with my husband after the event occurred until at least 20 years later, when for some reason, the memory of that night returned. i suspect that we could have been abducted, or simply just had our memories erased for a time. when i mentioned the event to my husband, who by then was my ex, he immediately remembered it, but not in as much detail as i did. i am not aware if anyone else saw it and if they had, i bet their memories would have been tampered with as well. i am sure i could find the address to our apartment as it would be listed on my son's birth certificate. at this time all of my belongings are packed as we plan to move to alaska again. i wish i had pictures.

when i saw the craft, i knew exactly what it was as i had seen a smaller version of it before around december 1975, when the same husband was in the army and we were living on the military post in el paso, texas. it was also late at night. that's a whole other story. one that sort of creeps me out. 

some family members also witnessed close up sightings as well. my grandmother saw one hoovering over the end of her trailer where i was sleeping, when i was visiting her in louisiana, when i was around 8 years old. my mother, the neighbor across the street, and some friends leaving our house saw a small craft as it was hoovering just above our road and when our friends car was driving away it rose to just above the car then in a flash it shot straight up. that happened in front of my childhood home located right across from houston's hobby airport. there were 4 witnesses to that event.
content.summary: It was hovering above our apartment we we returned home.It began moving towards us and i jumped out of the truck. husband wanted to follow it. our memories of event were taken until years later. i believe we were either abducted or had memories blocked.

content.detailedDescription: Was going on balcony with my wife to smoke and enjoy the nice night. as soon as i stepped on the balcony these two bright orange fireball like lights come over the condo building across from ours.I screamed to my wife to come quick and see. they were flying almost floating in parallel to each other. they kept the same distance but seemed like they were bouncing in the sky moving at a steady speed.I couldn't believe my eyes. these 2 orbs were abnormally bright (not the usual air plane lights)and my wife,who is a sceptic when it comes to ufos, was freaking out. we both stayed there,flabbergasted at what we just witnessed. the lights kept flying straight right over our condo and then we lost sight of the orbs of light.
content.summary: 2 bright orange fireball like orbs flying parallel across the sky almost floating orbs pulsating, no noise

content.detailedDescription: I was outside smoking and watching the moon. i saw a dark tumbling object cross slowly through the moonlight just under the moon heading north towards the mountains. it seemed to be either diamond or pyramid shaped.It flew into the dark patches of sky and i lost sight of it.
content.summary: Tumbling object.

content.detailedDescription:
Was driving east on oso pky in mission viejo when my wife noticed low lights not blinking. they were perfectly spaced and seemed to be hovering. since i was driving i pulled over and took video. 
was on disbelief - not any plane helicopter or anything i have ever seen. seemed to spread apart then disapear.
content.summary: Lights observes along with several other cars. pulled over took video w son and wife. appeared to spread apart and then disappear.

content.detailedDescription:
My fianc�� and i were out watching the "super moon" as it was rising in the southeastern horizon. 

we had parked near a pasture that had recently been cut and bailed.  i parked my truck toward the se so we could view the moon as it climbed in the sky.  on the far side on the pasture there was a tree line, approximately 600 yards away from us, which served as the southeastern boundary of the pasture.  at approximately 2100 hours cdt we observed a lighted object rise up from the tree line, moving slow at first, and come directly toward us.  the object seemed to accelerate and climb rapidly as it came toward us.  once it was directly overhead we saw it separate into two lighted objects.  the total duration of the event was approximately 15 seconds. 

the object was a bluish-white light, spherical, and without definite size or shape.  there was no sound or navigation lighting which is indicative of man made aircraft.  the direction of movement was straight-line from the southeast to the northwest. 

when i first saw the light appear it seemed to come from the tree line and gradually rise and move toward us.  my first thought and comment was, "look, there's a drone flying up from the field!"  i honestly thought someone was operating a lighted drone on the far side of the field in an effort to film the moonrise.  however, the lighted object appeared the rise and accelerate at a rapid rate as it moved toward us.  as it passed directly overhead we saw it separate into two lights, one trailing the other, and then vanish from sight.  the speed of the object was far greater than any aircraft i have ever observed.  there was no trail being ejected from the object, as is seen when meteorites hit the atmosphere and burn up, and there was no discernible arc to the movement.  it was a straight line of flight. 

we discussed what we had just seen and were both in agreement that the object was not a normal occurrence and was unexplainable.
content.summary: Object appeared out of tree line, 600 yards away.  came straight toward us.  rapid acceleration.  climbing fast.  when directly overhead it separated into two.
